name: Plague So Small
description:
Space or Return (Enter) to interact with NPCs
Arrow keys to Move
M to mute
R to restart
D to turn on/off dash
I'm sorry in advance for the crappy gameplay and getting stuck inside mushrooms

Assets are made by Aurora https://aurora-sprites.wixsite.com/main?lang=en

Free music from https://www.dl-sounds.com/royalty-free/oniku-loop2/
